tasks.task: Implement configuration validation to ensure LM Studio environment variables (`LMSTUDIO_BASE_URL`, `LMSTUDIO_MODEL`) are correctly parsed and used.
Integrate LM Studio into key agents and conduct end-to-end testing.
Implement timeout mechanisms and error handling for non-responsive LM Studio servers.
Update developer documentation to reflect the new integration and configuration options.

test: All functional requirements are met, as verified by acceptance criteria. Key agents function correctly with LM Studio without significant performance degradation. The integration is well-documented and easy to maintain.
